title: PR Manager, Canada
summary: Apple’s communications team informs the world about our innovative products and services, and the values that drive everything we do. We’re looking for trailblazing, collaborative professionals to drive strategy, planning, and execution of major product PR programs and initiatives for the Canadian market.
description: The successful candidate will bring energy and fresh storytelling ideas. You will be a local PR authority for your key product categories and corporate initiatives. You will work collaboratively with a variety of other teams and functions to create and deliver results-oriented PR programs. You will also use your knowledge of the traditional and social media landscape in Canada to broaden and deepen relationships with top tier business, technology, lifestyle, consumer, and specialty verticals.
preferred_qualifications: A demonstrated track record of delivering corporate and consumer PR campaigns, positive team-player passionate about technology and culture, self-starter dedicated to creative and critical thinking, able to work with ambiguity on complex topics, skilled in multi-tasking and delivering under tight timelines, excels at building formal and informal relationships, proficient in French.
